name: COLOR
V: Black, brown, blue black, blue, pink, decrease or absence of normal color
P: Red, purple, yellow, green, black, smoky
desc: COLOR as in complexion, discharges, discolorations. Pitta causes bright discolorations, Vata dark discolorations and Kapha pale discolorations. The color of Pitta usually reflects excess bile or blood. The color of Kapha reflects excess water or phlegm; that of Vata reflects excess gas or decay of tissues. Discolorations are more typical of Pitta disorders.
